channel.title: Play The Field
channel.description: Play The Field is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated, tune in!

item.title: Introducing Play The Field
item.description:
Play The Field, hosted by Tyler Purdy, Max Adams, & Liam Spellman, is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated! Be sure to tune in on Wednesdays!
